00058 namespace Sass {
00059   using namespace std;
00060 
00061   template<typename F, typename S, typename T>
00062   struct triple {
00063     F first;
00064     S second;
00065     T third;
00066 
00067     triple(const F& f, const S& s, const T& t) : first(f), second(s), third(t) { }
00068   };
00069 
00070   template<typename F, typename S, typename T>
00071   triple<F, S, T> make_triple(const F& f, const S& s, const T& t)
00072   { return triple<F, S, T>(f, s, t); }
00073 
00074   template<typename K, typename V>
00075   class Subset_Map {
00076   private:
00077     vector<V> values_;
00078     map<K, vector<triple<vector<K>, set<K>, size_t> > > hash_;
00079   public:
00080     void put(const vector<K>& s, const V& value);
00081     vector<pair<V, vector<K> > > get_kv(const vector<K>& s);
00082     vector<V> get_v(const vector<K>& s);
00083     bool empty() { return values_.empty(); }
00084     void clear() { values_.clear(); hash_.clear(); }
00085     const vector<V> values(void) { return values_; }
00086   };
00087 
00088   template<typename K, typename V>
00089   void Subset_Map<K, V>::put(const vector<K>& s, const V& value)
00090   {
00091     if (s.empty()) throw "internal error: subset map keys may not be empty";
00092     size_t index = values_.size();
00093     values_.push_back(value);
00094     set<K> ss;
00095     for (size_t i = 0, S = s.size(); i < S; ++i)
00096     { ss.insert(s[i]); }
00097     for (size_t i = 0, S = s.size(); i < S; ++i)
00098     {
00099       hash_[s[i]];
00100       hash_[s[i]].push_back(make_triple(s, ss, index));
00101     }
00102   }
00103 
00104   template<typename K, typename V>
00105   vector<pair<V, vector<K> > > Subset_Map<K, V>::get_kv(const vector<K>& s)
00106   {
00107     vector<K> sorted = s;
00108     sort(sorted.begin(), sorted.end());
00109     vector<pair<size_t, vector<K> > > indices;
00110     for (size_t i = 0, S = s.size(); i < S; ++i) {
00111       if (!hash_.count(s[i])) {
00112         continue;
00113       }
00114       vector<triple<vector<K>, set<K>, size_t> > subsets = hash_[s[i]];
00115       // cerr << "length of subsets: " << subsets.size() << endl;
00116       for (size_t j = 0, T = subsets.size(); j < T; ++j) {
00117         if (!includes(sorted.begin(), sorted.end(), subsets[j].second.begin(), subsets[j].second.end())) {
00118           // cout << vector_to_string(s) << " doesn't include " << set_to_string(subsets[j].second) << endl;
00119           continue;
00120         }
00121         indices.push_back(make_pair(subsets[j].third, subsets[j].first));
00122         // cerr << "pushed " << subsets[j].third << " and " << vector_to_string(subsets[j].first) << " onto indices" << endl;
00123       }
00124     }
00125     sort(indices.begin(), indices.end());
00126     typename vector<pair<size_t, vector<K> > >::iterator indices_end = unique(indices.begin(), indices.end());
00127     indices.resize(distance(indices.begin(), indices_end));
00128 
00129     vector<pair<V, vector<K> > > results;
00130     for (size_t i = 0, S = indices.size(); i < S; ++i) {
00131       results.push_back(make_pair(values_[indices[i].first], indices[i].second));
00132     }
00133     return results;
00134   }
00135 
00136   template<typename K, typename V>
00137   vector<V> Subset_Map<K, V>::get_v(const vector<K>& s)
00138   {
00139     vector<pair<V, vector<K> > > kvs = get_kv(s);
00140     vector<V> results;
00141     for (size_t i = 0, S = kvs.size(); i < S; ++i) results.push_back(kvs[i].first);
00142     return results;
00143   }
00144 
00145 }
